title: New: Daniel Wilson – Will You
body:
Detroit’s **Daniel Wilson** has one of those voices which is just made for a hit single.

With a dozen or so tracks disappearing from his Soundcloud, and management stepping in, you can guarantee that there’s something special going on behind the scenes, with new track _Will You_ being the first of what appears to be new material, with a crisper, more produced sound. It’s more considered and, if possible, even smoother than his demos; immediately affecting whilst improving with each and every listen. Check it out below.
